title: arputa mAyAvi
sahitya:
arputa mAyAvi unakkE aDaikkalam ennAvi


anupallavi

  arputa vAzhvai nin pork-karam IndEn pongisaik-kuzhalenap-pozhiga nin pugazhE


caraNam    pazhagiya paNbuDan azhagiya iyarkkaiyil pashu mukham kATTugirAi 
pArvaiyaik-konjiDum pariti ulagilE pala kalaiyUTTugirAi
izhaiyaNuk-kUTTinil ettanai shaktigaL ilagiDa nITTugirAi
engum iruppAi ingum iruppAi ihapara sukhangaLai inidu surappAi
